public class ScenarioDialog

Scenario dialog box used to add and edit one scenario at a time.

Author:
Myung-joo Ko, Paulo Merson

Constructor Detail

ScenarioDialog

public ScenarioDialog(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parentShell,
                      ScenarioVO scenarioVO)
Constructor for the class. When user click "New Scenario", scenarioVO is null and scenario input dialog box shows default values of text, type, unit and value of each six parts. When user click "Edit Scenario", scenarioVOscenario input dialog box shows user input values of text, type, unit and value of each six parts.

Parameters:
parentShell - the window from which this dialog is being called.
scenarioVO - scenario to be edited.
Method Detail

close

public boolean close()
User is trying to close the dialog box. Check if there's unsaved data and let the user choose to save before closing (or cancel close operation).

See Also:
Window.close()
